snippet: The International Olympic Committee said it was “premature” to speculate about taking the 2016 Games away from Rio de Janeiro.
abstract: International Olympic Committee says it was 'premature' to speculate about taking the 2016 Olympics away from Rio de Janerio, but IOC president Thomas Bach says construction holdups and political paralysis have reached a critical point for a decision to be made.
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee said it was “premature” to speculate about taking the 2016 Games away from Rio de Janeiro.
